Organics:
 
The femme rested a slender finger on Windlord's chin.
"Don't be too hard on yourself.  Just talk things out and you'll be alright.  I'll be there to protect you," she added with a wink.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

"Do you think that it's good idea??? I messed up"said windlord and 
he repeat his chat with Wolfblade and how it reacted "I regret to be 
so stupid... so..."
